title: The Mystery of the Hooded Horsemen

sources.title: TheMysteryOfTheHoodedHorseman
sources.description: Title: The Mystery of the Hooded Horsemen Summary: Tex is up against a group of hooded outlaws. When he shoots one, he uses the hood to infiltrate the gang. Almost caught by them, he escapes only to be arrested by the Sheriff who thinks ... Directed by: Ray Taylor Actors: Tex Ritter, White Flash, Iris Meredith Production Company: Boots and Saddles Pictures Release Date: 6 August 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Tex is up against a group of hooded outlaws. When he shoots one, he uses the hood to infiltrate the gang. Almost caught by them, he escapes only to be arrested by the Sheriff who thinks he's one of the gang.

sources.title: The Mystery of the Hooded Horsemen (1937) Tex Ritter | Action, Comedy, Mystery
sources.description:
The singing, fighting Texan smashes the hooded band!  Tex is up against a group of hooded outlaws. When he shoots one, he uses the hood to infiltrate the gang. Almost caught by them, he escapes only to be arrested by the Sheriff who thinks he's one of the gang.

Director: Ray Taylor
Writers: Edmond Kelso, Edmond Kelso 
Stars: Tex Ritter, White Flash, Iris Meredith
Genres: Classics, Action, Comedy, Mystery, Romance, Western
